Name: Promulgation of Department of Buildings Legal, Administrative, Operational and Technical Policy and Procedure Notices.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City charter, in relation to the promulgation of Department of Buildings Legal, Administrative, Operational and Technical Policy and Procedure Notices.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings due back on 9/15/2004.
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be enacted by the Council as follows:

    	Section 1. Paragraph a of subdivision 5 of section 1041 of the New York City charter is amended to read as follows:
a. "Rule" shall include, but not be limited to, any statement or communication which prescribes (i) standards which, if violated, may result in a sanction or penalty; (ii) a fee to be charged by or required to be paid to an agency; (iii) standards for the issuance, suspension or revocation of a license or permit, including, but not limited to, legal, administrative, operational and technical policy and procedure notices issued by the department of buildings; (iv) standards for any product, material, or service which must be met before manufacture, distribution, sale or use; (v) standards for the procurement of goods and services; (vi) standards for the disposition of public property or property under agency control; or (vii) standards for the granting of loans or other benefits.

    Section 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
